text.section: In this title the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Emergency road service" means the adjustment, repair, or replacement of the equipment, tires, or mechanical parts of a motor vehicle so that the motor vehicle may be operated under its own power.
"License" means a license issued by the Commissioner to provide motor club service.
"Licensee" means a motor club that is licensed by the Commissioner to provide motor club service.
"Member" means a member or subscriber of a motor club.
"Motor club" means a person engaged directly or indirectly in selling or offering for sale, furnishing, or procuring motor club service.
"Representative" means an individual who, for compensation, solicits or sells memberships, subscriptions, or franchises for a motor club.
